column1: Little Goat Diner////Felt like having a hearty breakfast today to fill the engine with good gas for running errands in this tropical weather we're experiencing in Chicago today. (10 degrees - insert palm tree).  Corned beef hash and eggs
column2: poached.  (Sometimes I like to make the dish messy like a five year old and break the yolk to watch the ooze).  The hash browns in the mix were crispy and tasty
column3: bits of smoked corned beef for flavor and one of the eggs was perfectly poached
column4: the other was the Danny Devito of the pair. (Referencing the movie Twins). A very good portion though
column5: just needed a wee bit more salt.
